level.text: The words defined in ยง 1 of the Act (D.C. Official Code ยง 47-2884.01) shall have the same meaning when used in this chapter.
When used in this chapter, the following terms and phrases shall have the meanings ascribed:
Pledge – an article or articles or personal property of other valuable thing deposited with a pawnbroker as security for a loan.
Pledgor – the person who delivers a pledge into the possession of a pawnbroker.
Director – the Director of the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs or the Director’s agent, representative, or designee.
Chief of Police – the Chief of Police, Metropolitan Police Department of the District of Columbia.
